评论详情: I was so surprised at how much I love this set. Right now I'm in the" I hate my body stage".I'm 5'7" 190lb. I developed a shelf I never knew could exist. This outfit hits in all the right places. I orders XLG the first time and loved it because the elastic in the waist does not dig in. The top is long enough to cover "the shelf" and it still gives you a shape , seems to highlight your best features. I did have to order a LG in one color because XLG was sold out, it was just a bit more snug in the tush but still so comfortable. I will say I carry most of my weight in the front so big in the back girls may have a different experience. The top is pretty warm, so it may hinder the amount of times you will get to wear it out each season, but I do love this set .btw I'm 64 and would consider this as gifts for any age group.

The feel is great, quality is perfect and feels like something you’d get in a boutique honestly. I love the colors they offer and the price is great. The shorts, in my opinion, are the perfect length, and the crew neck sweatshirt is just so comfortable. I’ve washed and dried mine (lower heat) a few times already and nothing shrank or pilled.
